modName: Harkon's Sword - Unenchantable and No Vampire Requirement
summary: A small mod that makes Harkon's sword unenchantable and removes the vampire requirement.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Harkon's Sword - Unenchantable and No Vampire Requirement[/size]

[size=3]This mod takes the sword you can get at the end of the Dawnguard quest line and makes it unenchantable so that you can add the enchant to other weapons. It also takes away the vampire requirement for the enchantment on the sword itself.

Install with a mod installer or simply drop the esp into your Data folder and activate.[/size]
author: Seyon
